Posts.Content: Jul 30, 2009 10:27PM drmel wrote: I was told to use X Clair radiation cream right after radiation, and then again at night. It's costly - i paid 75.00 and my insurance covered very little, although after chatting one day when the machine broke, I found others were paying a little less. The nurse also told me that when i'm further along, she has an aloe plant that she uses. I started on July 9 and have completed 16 out of 33 days.
Posts.Title: AUGUST 2009 RADS Alyad ChrisC433
